metadata.title: CVE-2022-0983 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An SQL injection risk was identified in Badges code relating to configuringcriteria. Access to the relevant capability was limited to teachers andmanagers by default.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
